item.description:
Free Ron Paul book for attendees, while they last!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Facebook RSVP here: http://www.facebook.com/events/271348406312547

On the agenda: CT NDAA Nullification legislation will be our main focus of this month's meeting. States such as Virginia and most recently Rhode Island have passed legislation blocking the unconstitutional sections of the NDAA (including indefinite detention without trial). Even towns such as Northampton have passed resolutions "opting out" of the bill, and liberty activists in Massachusetts are hard at work pushing for bans in other regions and at the state level. We'll have a short interactive presentation and discuss our coalition strategy for getting legislation sponsored and passed, as well as any other topics people wish to discuss.

We'll also have a dozen copies of Ron Paul's NY Times best selling book, "End the Fed" free for those who attend. The book has a list price of $21.99.

Join us as we discuss and put into action our goal of spreading freedom in Connecticut. Ron Paul's 2012 presidential campaign has reignited the fires of liberty in the Constitution State and we plan to carry that momentum into ongoing projects.

Please come out and contribute your thoughts and ideas into the mix. Our meetup members come from various social, religious and political backgrounds; everyone is invited to participate as long as you respect personal liberty.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the tables to the right in the back.
item.name: CT for Liberty NDAA Nullification Meetup
